name: Good Pizza, Great Pizza
overview: In Good Pizza, Great Pizza, you are the brand new owner of a pizzeria striving to make it big in the city. Unlock new ingredients that will satisfy even the pickiest of eaters and purchase new upgrades to fling out those pies even faster! You will meet unique characters and might even make a friend or two along the way. In addition to serving up some delicious pizzas, your ability to manage your time and money will be put to the test as each chapter will present different challenges to face on your journey to becoming the master ovenist.
